# Sign (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 189

*The tea leaves burst into flames between your fingers, and for a brief moment you see the future in the billowing smoke.*

You get a +4 bonus on your next initiative check.

*Material Component:* A small piece of dried goat intestine or some tea leaves.
